name: MySpotifyStats
desc: A website for checking various features of a Spotify account, using the Spotify API. This site is used by an average of 1500 users monthly, and has had over 60,000 users since its creation.

name: Masters Dissertation
desc: My postgrad dissertation undertaken with the Crime and Security Research Institute of Cardiff. My aim was to analyse the topical and political makeup of the r/conspiracy subreddit. This resulted in a political classifier which was able to differentiate between left and right wing text.

name: MyBookChoice
desc: My undergrad final year project. A fully-functional book recommender and social network. My reports, spreadsheets, and ethical approval are also available via the external link.

name: Wikiraces
desc: A site for creating and playing Wikipedia races.

name: Pathfinding
desc:
A small A* path finding p5js implementation. This is a completely static implementation with no back-end, and is meant to demonstrate the applications of theory and algorithms. 
 This site is live, and the GitHub repository is publicly available.

name: Victoria Nursery
desc: Website for a small nursery based in Penarth.

name: React Roulette
desc: A proof-of-concept React application for playing a static roulette game.

name: Projects Site
desc: A website containing information about my projects, including technologies used.
